result.title: Codeforces' testing system
result.content:
Codeforces' testing system is somehow wrong. For example: on problem 872A ( http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/872/A ) i submitted my code and i got WA on pretest 3. This looks something like this (first image) . I did not believe that this is wrong. So i ran this code but this showed the right answer (second and third image). SO i made a conclusion that sometimes Codeforces' testing system is wrong even though our code is true! I hope they will fix this!

First image : https://ibb.co/ghzOT6 Second image : https://ibb.co/mOV8vm Third image : https://ibb.co/keUOT6
